title: The most unfun champions to play?
body: We always talk about how much it sucks when playing against certain champions, but who are champions whom regardless of meta strength are just not fun to play as for you?

replies.body: {{champion:19}} Literally can be played with one hand
What yah doing with the other hand eh?
Playing {{champion:27}}  on his laptop.
{{champion:27}}

Learn to ctrl 4.

Then he is a lot of fun.
I bind my /laugh key to C, it's a lot easier
I've got it on Z
{{champion:27}} +{{item:3009}} +{{item:3742}} = RUNNING SIMULATOR!!

Whoever downvoted you is just simply put: moron..

Is it so hard to understand that some people dislike some champions? The F$$$ u downvote him for that?
If they feel the need to downvote me, so be it. I just don't have fun playing Singed if people don't like that that's their problem.
I just don't understand their mentality..
Some people just downvote things they don't necessarily agree with, and it's fine that they have that opinion.

{{champion:157}}  is just
so
fucking
boring
literally all you do is auto attack and q, yeah, his other skills are useful, but still.
But I'll still play him, cuz i know he's strong right now, and i like my LP.

> [{quoted}](name=ILikeEatPie,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=O0cNO51E,comment-id=001d,timestamp=2015-12-18T01:16:41.526+0000)

you bastard
To be honest, atleast he's being honest XD

{{champion:77}} 

You literally just run around in the jungle wearing a dress and slapping people.

he is basically like this:
Press Q- auto attack fast
press W- heal up while auto attacking
press E- Stun and get more auto attacks off
Press R- AoE auto attack
really boring.
{{champion:69}} is literally so boring.. same spammy playstyle all day and you constantly run OOM.
Tfw your middle finger cramps.
I say rammus
Not OK
{{champion:19}} . Every ability is something that makes him slap them or slap them faster. Or slap them where they don't expect to be slapped. Yawn.

> [{quoted}](name=jpersinne,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=O0cNO51E,comment-id=000c,timestamp=2015-12-17T23:46:24.606+0000)
>
> {{champion:19}} . Every ability is something that makes him slap them or slap them faster. Or slap them where they don't expect to be slapped. Yawn.

Honestly ghe only thing that slaps faster is the velkoz emote spam

{{champion:10}} 
Hit E, turn on autoattacks.

Cast Q and W when people try to run. Ult when you are being hit.

Some people enjoy her, but I am just bored out of my mind when I play this champ.

I think one of the things that redeems Kayle's minimalistic kit is how flexible she is with runes/masteries and item builds. There are countless ways to build her, and she can be a very unpredictable pick in support, mid or top position. She makes very good use of just about any strong offensive item you put in her hands, and can be built quite beefy and still retain a strong offensive-oriented identity.

One of the first Champs I started playing, enjoyed the hell out of it.

{{champion:254}} she is so frustrating a tank assassin with cc :/ and that point and click ult...

{{champion:119}} if he farms/gets ahead your game is going to be impossible to win
Did you even read the original post? What champions don't you enjoy playing as? (NOT against)

oh it has to be {{champion:67}} i become 10x more toxic when i play her

Yorick Yorick Yorick{{champion:83}} Yorick {{champion:83}} 

I bought him, played him in maybe 3 games, and then refunded him because his lane is so faceroll stupid easy and boring.

Try him in the jungle. Then he's super fun.

TBH I actually love his playstyle top or jungle.
Yeah, I like to rush drag after level 3.
WHAT?!?!??! YORICK IS THE MOST FUN CHAMP IVE EVER PLAYED BEST PURCHASE OF MY LIFE NOT EVEN SARCASM

{{champion:74}} 

Most boring champ I ever played. Set up turrets and just stand there and collect farm. Occasionally press E and/or Q when the enemy gets too close. He is a good champ if you need to AFK or Alt+tab or something.

You hate playing as a little less than half the cast of the game?

{{champion:223}} It may seem strange, but the fact that he's always in so little danger is what makes him boring to play. I just have to lick some fools and eat more fools to win.
{{champion:412}} I peel and hook, I peel and hook. If that isn't enough to save the idiot ADC, we're dead.
{{champion:67}} 100% autoattacks. If they have a wall behind them, throw down a condemn. That's about it...
You forgot you type outplayed when you kite the immobile melee champ.

> [{quoted}](name=chipi99,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=O0cNO51E,comment-id=003a0000,timestamp=2015-12-18T06:16:30.059+0000)
>
> You forgot you type outplayed when you kite the immobile melee champ.

This makes me hate Vayne's kit AND playerbase at the same time

{{champion:23}} EVERYTHING about this guy is just cringe worthy. Sure maybe he's op but gawd just standing there AA the whole time is boring as hell while his W just helps him catch up to the target for MORE AUTO and you arent going to use his E for anything but Running away when your ult finally wears off. That's another thing press R and I'm your god for a few seconds that feel like half an hour. I'm still just spamming Auto.
{{champion:99}} She's so safe and carries so easily. Assuming you land your q, just win with your E and R in quick succession. If they don't die, land q and e again. All while being 4 miles away.

{{champion:79}}
I dont like playing him as a tank. It was way more fun to go top and build defensive AP items for him (after the rework). Then patch 4.13 ruined the fun...

{{champion:29}} and {{champion:9}} feel like some of the least fun champs for me. Twitch has one skillshot that has almost no impact to his performance and just feels lame outside of a successful ult or assassination. Overall twitch isn't so fun for me and its somewhat hard to explain exactly why... just feels uninspiring to play as. Fidd on the other hand isn't fun for me because he is a one trick pony with all his power in his ult. Get a good ult? you are a good fidd. Bad ult? bad fidd. Also I really don't like the rng bounce on his e and how he has a really lackluster theme going on... we get it, you're a scarecrow.

{{champion:29}} is a terrible champion unless you can sneak up on your enemies while ahead this is his only strength i feel, but i love the little guy and wish we could have strong twitch 

like i realy love him to the piont he was my go to adc untill he became unreliable becuase his carry playstyle got gutted in place of being a snowball assasin adc of the likes of {{champion:133}}  and {{champion:96}}

A fed Twitch though is surprisingly fun to play, if not rare. Getting to the late game with him is like trying to climb up a sheer cliff. Especially since most of the other marksman seemingly crap all over him unless the support is basically spoon feeding you.

I still love my little rat, even if he's not exactly reliable.
{{champion:68}} Just no engaging

{{champion:32}}  Q Ult Cry...
{{champion:36}}  Cleaver Cleaver Cleaver
{{champion:28}} I hate everything she has but the passive
{{champion:85}}  no hate, just dont like the kit
{{champion:11}} Auto Auto Auto Q Repeat Or feed
{{champion:77}} no hate, just boring

{{champion:22}} is just... Guh. It doesn't ever feel like I'm DOING anything when playing her.

{{champion:16}} too, because being a healbot is... I can't even muster up a sarcastic "fun" to describe it.
{{champion:22}} Sooooooooo boring.

{{champion:36}} Of all the sustain mechanisms, he has the least interactive. At least Garen makes you dodge combat for a few seconds to trigger. This guy is basically "Build {{item:3065}} and {{item:3083}} , then just AA things". Oh, and spam Q at people. At least {{champion:19}} can boost other people and {{champion:77}} can time stuns right; {{champion:36}}  just hits things, with an ability to hit things slightly harder and an ult that is just basically "boost my already uninteractive passive to gay OP levels".

Oh yeah, and let's make 45% of his strength countererable by an 800g item. {{item:3123}} At least he can rest easy knowing that no one will ever build it.

> [{quoted}](name=Darien Juranas,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=O0cNO51E,comment-id=005b,timestamp=2015-12-18T13:22:12.354+0000)
> Oh yeah, and let's make 45% of his strength countererable by an 800g item. {{item:3123}} At least he can rest easy knowing that no one will ever build it.

I've tried building mortal reminder on my adc against him, and I honestly found {{item:3034}} to be more effective for some reason.
